body_html:
How do I disable opencv? I don't see a build option in setup.py. Setting FULL_CAFFE2=0 still builds all kinds of stuff with caffe2 in its name (annoyingly, the majority of the compilation time seems to be taken up by caffe2, which I don't need).
Likewise, the env vars USE_DISTRIBUTED and USE_OPENCV do not seem to be respected. Even setting them to OFF per default in the CMakeLists doesn't seem to work.

body:
How do I disable opencv? I don't see a build option in `setup.py`. Setting `FULL_CAFFE2=0` still builds all kinds of stuff with caffe2 in its name (annoyingly, the majority of the compilation time seems to be taken up by caffe2, which I don't need).
Likewise, the env vars `USE_DISTRIBUTED` and `USE_OPENCV` do not seem to be respected. Even setting them to `OFF` per default in the CMakeLists doesn't seem to work.
